author: Sam Bright
description:
Reform UK leader Nigel Farage has mentioned his constituency fewer than half a dozen times in the House of Commons, DeSmog can reveal. Farage has been criticised for making multiple trips to the United States since he was elected as the MP for Clacton in July 2024, as well as earning £970,000 from second jobs. […]

The post Nigel Farage Has Mentioned Clacton Only Four Times in Commons appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Nigel Farage Has Mentioned Clacton Only Four Times in Commons
